title: 1.12.2 catserver 装了工业2就崩溃
author: keithqwq
txt_content:
服务器只装工业2， 然后开启就如下面所示
[attach]1501355[/attach]
卡在这里
然后出现下面这些报错，就自动关闭了
[15:42:39] [Server thread/ERROR]: Encountered an unexpected exception
net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoaderExceptionModCrash: Caught exception from IndustrialCraft 2 (ic2)

Caused by: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
        at java.util.LinkedHashMap$LinkedEntrySet.iterator(LinkedHashMap.java:642) ~[?:1.8.0_242]
        at java.util.AbstractCollection.toArray(AbstractCollection.java:180) ~[?:1.8.0_242]
        at com.google.common.collect.Iterables.toArray(Iterables.java:295) ~[minecraft_server.1.12.2.jar:?]
        at com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap.copyOf(ImmutableMap.java:406) ~[minecraft_server.1.12.2.jar:?]
        at com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap.copyOf(ImmutableMap.java:391) ~[minecraft_server.1.12.2.jar:?]
        at com.google.common.collect.SparseImmutableTable.<init>(SparseImmutableTable.java:90) ~[minecraft_server.1.12.2.jar:?]
        at com.google.common.collect.RegularImmutableTable.forOrderedComponents(RegularImmutableTable.java:169) ~[minecraft_server.1.12.2.jar:?]

        at com.google.common.collect.ImmutableTable$Builder.build(ImmutableTable.java:359) ~[minecraft_server.1.12.2.jar:?]
        at com.google.common.collect.ImmutableTable.copyOf(ImmutableTable.java:221) ~[minecraft_server.1.12.2.jar:?]
        at com.google.common.collect.ImmutableTable.copyOf(ImmutableTable.java:211) ~[minecraft_server.1.12.2.jar:?]
        at net.minecraft.block.state.BlockStateContainer$StateImplementation.func_177235_a(BlockStateContainer.java:281) ~[awu$a.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.block.state.BlockStateContainer.<init>(BlockStateContainer.java:95) ~[awu.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.block.state.BlockStateContainer.<init>(BlockStateContainer.java:62) ~[awu.class:?]
        at ic2.core.block.state.Ic2BlockState.<init>(Ic2BlockState.java:24) ~[Ic2BlockState.class:?]
        at ic2.core.block.BlockTileEntity.func_180661_e(BlockTileEntity.java:254) ~[BlockTileEntity.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.block.Block.<init>(Block.java:234) ~[aow.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.block.Block.<init>(Block.java:243) ~[aow.class:?]
        at ic2.core.block.BlockBase.<init>(BlockBase.java:45) ~[BlockBase.class:?]
        at ic2.core.block.BlockBase.<init>(BlockBase.java:37) ~[BlockBase.class:?]
        at ic2.core.block.BlockTileEntity.<init>(BlockTileEntity.java:110) ~[BlockTileEntity.class:?]
        at ic2.core.block.BlockTileEntity.create(BlockTileEntity.java:102) ~[BlockTileEntity.class:?]
        at ic2.core.block.BlockTileEntity.create(BlockTileEntity.java:92) ~[BlockTileEntity.class:?]
        at ic2.core.block.TeBlockRegistry.buildBlocks(TeBlockRegistry.java:244) ~[TeBlockRegistry.class:?]
        at ic2.core.init.BlocksItems.initBlocks(BlocksItems.java:171) ~[BlocksItems.class:?]
        at ic2.core.init.BlocksItems.init(BlocksItems.java:157) ~[BlocksItems.class:?]
        at ic2.core.IC2.load(IC2.java:222) ~[IC2.class:?]
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_242]
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62) ~[?:1.8.0_242]

        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498) ~[?:1.8.0_242]
[15:42:39] [Server thread/ERROR]: This crash report has been saved to: /root/mc/./crash-reports/crash-2020-03-14_15.42.39-server.txt
[15:42:39] [Server thread/INFO]: Stopping server
[15:42:39] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving worlds
[15:42:39] [Server thread/INFO]: The state engine was in incorrect state INITIALIZATION and forced into state SERVER_STOPPED. Errors may have been discarded.

小白求解，系统是centos8，之前试了centos7和debian9 都是这样

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
内存不足
Caused by: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
当然可能是内存泄漏 但是我不知道你分了多少内存
换个工业版本呢？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 内存不足，多分配一点就行

replies.author: keithqwq
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2020-3-14 15:45
内存不足
Caused by: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
当然可能是内存泄漏 但是我不知道你 ...
2g内存 
我启动的时候用的代码是
java -jar xxx.jar
默认不会自动分配上去吗

replies.author: keithqwq
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-14 15:45
内存不足，多分配一点就行
2g内存
我启动的时候用的代码是
java -jar xxx.jar替换
不会自动分配上去吗

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
keithqwq 发表于 2020-3-14 15:47
2g内存 
我启动的时候用的代码是
java -jar xxx.jar
默认不会分全部内存上去
根据系统剩余内存分配+会给系统保留内存

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
keithqwq 发表于 2020-3-14 15:47
2g内存
我启动的时候用的代码是
java -jar xxx.jar替换
手动设置下，没设置实际上也是会自动分配一定的内存，没记错的话

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content: 2G内存带不起mod服，分配个4096mb试试，而且最大不带表一定分4096（删除线究竟怎么打出来

replies.author: keithqwq
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2020-3-14 15:47
默认不会分全部内存上去
根据系统剩余内存分配+会给系统保留内存
好吧，我去试试，谢谢大佬们了

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
keithqwq 发表于 2020-3-14 15:47
2g内存 
我启动的时候用的代码是
java -jar xxx.jar
不会，默认好像才256M，要手动给
